import React from 'react'; import logo from '../../images/logo.png'; import styles from './Form.module.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Form = () => { const [fields, setFields] = React.useState({ name: '', position: '', birth: '', marital: '0', gender: '0', address: '', neighborhood: '', city: '', cep: '', phone1: '', phone2: '', cellphone: '', email: '', identity: '', cpf: '', vehicle: '0', license: '0' }); function handleInputChange(event){ fields[event.target.name] = event.target.value; setFields(fields); } return (
